title: Yakeppachi
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Okonomiyaki eatery 10 minutes from Hiroshima station, by Hakushima tram stop. Has an English menu that states "no egg or no meat - no problem!" Okonomiyaki can be requested vegetarian or vegan, and a variety of veg toppings and side dishes including fresh tofu, fried leeks, marinated cucumber or sweet potato, and sweet potato omelette. Staff is accommodating.
